name: VESPER
preparation: Shake and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Add the garnish.

name: BACARDI
preparation: Pour all ingredients into shaker with ice cubes, shake well, strain into chilled cocktail glass.

name: NEGRONI
preparation: Pour all ingredients directly into old-fashioned glass filled with ice. Stir gently. Garnish with half orange slice.

name: ROSE
preparation: Stir all ingredients with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

name: OLD FASHIONED
preparation: Place sugar cube in old-fashioned glass and saturate with bitters, add a dash of plain water. Muddle until dissolve.  Fill the glass with ice cubes and add whisky.  Garnish with orange slice and a cocktail cherry.

name: TUXEDO
preparation: Stir all ingredients with ice and strain into cocktail glass. Garnish with a cocktail cherry and a lemon zest twist.

name: MOJITO
preparation: Muddle mint springs with sugar and lime juice. Add splash of soda water and fill glass with cracked ice. Pour rum and top with soda water. Garnish with spring of mint leaves and lemon slice. Serve with straw.

name: HORSE’S NECK
preparation: Pour brandy and ginger ale directly into hi-ball glass with ice cubes. Stir gently. Garnish with rind of one lemon spiral. If required, add dashes of Angostura bitters.

name: PLANTER'S PUNCH
preparation: Pour all ingredients, except the bitters, into shaker filled with ice. Shake well. Pour into large glass, filled with ice. Add Angostura bitters, “on top”. Garnish with cocktail cherry and pineapple.

name: SEA BREEZE
preparation: Build all ingredients in a rock glass filled with ice. Garnish with lime wedge.

name: PISCO SOUR
preparation: Shake and strain into a chilled champagne flute. Dash some Angostura bitters on top.

name: LONG ISLAND ICED TEA
preparation: Add all ingredients into highball glass filled with ice. Stir gently. Garnish with lemon spiral. Serve with straw.

name: CLOVER CLUB
preparation: Pour all ingredients into cocktail shaker filled with ice. Shake well. Strain into cocktail glass.

name: ANGEL FACE
preparation: Pour all ingredients into a shaker with ice. Shake. Strain into a cocktail glass.

name: MIMOSA
preparation: Pour orange juice into flute and gently pour Champagne. Stir gently. Garnish with orange twist (optional). Note: a Buck’s Fizz and a Mimosa are the same drink.

name: WHISKEY SOUR
preparation: Dash egg white (Optional: if used shake little harder to foam up the egg white). Pour all ingredients into cocktail shaker filled with ice. Shake well. Strain in cocktail glass. If served ‘On the rocks’, strain ingredients into old-fashioned glass filled with ice.  Garnish with half orange slice and maraschino cherry.

name: SCREWDRIVER
preparation: Pour all ingredients into a highball glass filled with ice. Stir gently.Garnish with a orange slice.

name: CUBA LIBRE
preparation: Build all ingredients in a highball glass filled with ice. Garnish with lime wedge.

name: MANHATTAN
preparation: Pour all ingredients into mixing glass with ice cubes. Stir well. Strain into chilled cocktail glass.  Garnish with cocktail cherry.

name: PORTO FLIP
preparation: Pour all ingredients into cocktail shaker filled with ice. Shake well. Strain into cocktail glass. Sprinkle with fresh ground nutmeg.

name: GIN FIZZ
preparation: Shake all ingredients with ice cubes, except soda water. Pour into tumbler. Top with soda water. Garnish with lemon slice.

name: ESPRESSO MARTINI

ingredients.special: Sugar syrup (according to individual preference of sweetness)

preparation: Shake and strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

name: MARGARITA
preparation: Pour all ingredients into shaker with ice. Shake well and strain into cocktail glass rimmed with salt (note:Fruit Margarita - blend selected fruit with the above recipe).

name: FRENCH 75
preparation: Pour all the ingredients, except champagne, into a shaker. Shake. Strain into a champagne flute.  Top up with champagne. Stir gently.

name: YELLOW BIRD
preparation: Shake and strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

name: PINA COLADA
preparation: Blend all the ingredients with ice in a electric blender, pour into a large goblet or Hurricane glass and serve with straws. Garnish with a slice of pineapple with a cocktail cherry.

name: AVIATION
preparation: Shake and strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

name: BELLINI
preparation: Pour peach puree into chilled glass and add sparkling wine. Stir gently. Variations: Puccini (fresh mandarin juice), Rossini (fresh strawberry puree), Tintoretto (fresh pomegranate juice)

name: GRASSHOPPER
preparation: Pour all ingredients into shaker filled with ice. Shake briskly for few seconds. Strain into chilled cocktail glass.

name: TEQUILA SUNRISE
preparation: Pour tequila and orange juice directly into highball with ice cubes. Add a splash of grenadine to create chromatic effect (sunrise), do not stir. Garnish with orange slice and cherry.

name: DAIQUIRI
preparation: Shake and strain into a cocktail glass.

name: RUSTY NAIL
preparation: Pour all ingredients directly into old-fashioned glass filled with ice. Stir gently. Garnish with lemon twist.

name: B52
preparation: Layer ingredients one at a time starting with Kahlua, followed by Bailey's Irish Cream and top with Grand Marnier. Flame the Grand Marnier, serve while the flame is still on, accompanied with a straw on side plate.

name: STINGER
preparation: Pour all ingredients into a mixing glass with ice. Stir. Strain into a cocktail glass.

name: GOLDEN DREAM
preparation: Pour all ingredients into shaker filled with ice. Shake briskly for few seconds. Strain into chilled cocktail glass.

name: GOD MOTHER
preparation: Pour all ingredients directly into old fashioned glass filled with ice cubes. Stir gently.

name: SPRITZ VENEZIANO
preparation: Build into an old-fashioned glass filled with ice. Top with a splash of soda water. Garnish with half orange slice.

name: BRAMBLE
preparation: Build over crushed ice, in a rock glass. Stir, then pour the blackberry liqueur over the top of the drink in a circular fashion. Garnish with a lemon slice, and two blackberries.

name: ALEXANDER
preparation: Shake and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Sprinkle with fresh ground nutmeg.

name: LEMON DROP MARTINI
preparation: Shake and strain into a chilled cocktail glass rimmed with sugar, garnish with a slice of lemon.

name: FRENCH MARTINI
preparation: Pour all ingredients into mixing glass with ice cubes. Stir well. Strain in chilled cocktail glass. Squeeze oil from lemon peel onto the drink.

name: BLACK RUSSIAN
preparation: Pour the ingredients into the old fashioned-glass filled with ice cubes. Stir gently. Note: for White Russian, float fresh cream on the top and stir gently.

name: BLOODY MARY
preparation: Stir gently, pour all ingredients into highball glass. Garnish with celery and lemon wedge (optional).

name: MAI-TAI
preparation: Shake and strain into highball glass. Garnish with pineapple spear, mint leaves and lime peel. Serve with straw.

name: SEX ON THE BEACH
preparation: Build all ingredients in a highball glass filled with ice. Garnish with orange slice.

name: MONKEY GLAND
preparation: Shake and strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

name: DERBY
preparation: Pour all ingredients into a mixing glass with ice. Stir.  Strain into a cocktail glass.  Garnish with a fresh mint leaves in the drink.

name: SIDECAR
preparation: Pour all ingredients into cocktail shaker filled with ice. Shake well and strain into cocktail glass.

name: IRISH COFFEE
preparation: Warm the Irish whiskey over a burner. Pour into the glass (for hot drink) hot coffee, and add a teaspoon of sugar. Float Cream on top.

name: SAZERAC
preparation: Rinse a chilled old-fashioned glass with the absinthe, add crushed ice and set it aside.  Stir the remaining ingredients over ice and set it aside.  Discard the ice and any excess absinthe from the prepared glass, and strain the drink into the glass. Add the Lemon peel for garnish. Note: The original recipe changed after the American Civil War, rye whiskey substituted cognac as it became hard to obtain.

name: AMERICANO
preparation: Mix the ingredients directly in an old-fashioned glass filled with ice-cubes, add a splash of soda water and garnish with half orange slice.

name: SINGAPORE SLING
preparation: Pour all ingredients into cocktail shaker filled with ice cubes. Shake well. Strain into highball glass. Garnish with pineapple and cocktail cherry.

name: FRENCH CONNECTION
preparation: Pour all ingredients directly into old fashioned glass filled with ice cubes. Stir gently.

name: MOSCOW MULE

ingredients.special: 1 slice lime in a highball glass

preparation: Combine the vodka and ginger beer. Add lime juice.  Garnish with a lime slice.

name: JOHN COLLINS
preparation: Pour all ingredients directly into highball glass filled with ice. Stir gently. Garnish with lemon slice and maraschino cherry. Add a dash of Angostura bitters. (Note: Use Old Tom Gin for Tom Collins)

name: KIR
preparation: Pour Créme de Cassis into glass, top up with white wine. For Kir Royal: Use champagne instead of white wine.

name: MINT JULEP
preparation: In a highball glass gently muddle the mint, sugar and water. Fill the glass with cracked ice, add Bourbon and stir well until the glass is frost. Garnish with a mint spring.

name: TOMMY’S MARGARITA
preparation: Shake and strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

name: PARADISE
preparation: Pour all ingredients into cocktail shaker filled with ice. Shake and strain into chilled cocktail glass.

name: DIRTY MARTINI
preparation: Pour all ingredients into mixing glass with ice cubes. Stir well. Strain in chilled martini glass. Garnish with green olive.

name: CHAMPAGNE COCKTAIL
preparation: Add dash of Angostura bitter onto sugar cube and drop it into champagne flute. Add cognac followed by pouring gently chilled champagne. Garnish with orange slice and maraschino cherry.

name: MARY PICKFORD
preparation: Shake and strain into a chilled large cocktail glass.

name: HEMINGWAY SPECIAL
preparation: Pour all ingredients into a shaker with ice. Shake. Strain into a double cocktail glass.

name: DARK ‘N' STORMY
preparation: In a highball glass filled with ice add 6cl Dark Rum and top with ginger beer. Garnish with lime wedge.

name: RAMOS FIZZ
preparation: Pour all ingredients (except soda) in a mixing glass, dry shake (no ice) for two minutes, add ice and hard shake for another minute. Strain into a highball glass without ice, top with soda.

name: RUSSIAN SPRING PUNCH
preparation: Shake the ingredients and pour into highball glass. Top with Sparkling wine. Garnish with a lemon slice and a blackberry.

name: GOD FATHER
preparation: Pour all ingredients directly into old fashioned glass filled with ice cubes. Stir gently.

name: COSMOPOLITAN
preparation: Shake all ingredients in cocktail shaker filled with ice. Strain into a large cocktail glass Garnish with lime slice.

name: DRY MARTINI
preparation: Pour all ingredients into mixing glass with ice cubes. Stir well. Strain in chilled martini glass. Squeeze oil from lemon peel onto the drink, or garnish with olive.

name: BETWEEN THE SHEETS
preparation: Pour all ingredients into shaker with ice cubes, shake, strain into chilled cocktail glass.

name: CASINO
preparation: Pour all ingredients into shaker with ice cubes, shake well, strain into chilled cocktail glass and garnish with a lemon twist and a maraschino cherry.

name: CAIPIRINHA

ingredients.special: half fresh lime cut into 4 wedges

preparation: Place lime and suger in old fashion glass and muddle. Fill glass with ice and Cachaca (note:Caipiroska- use Vodka instead of Cachaca).

name: VAMPIRO

ingredients.special: Few slices fresh red hot chili peppers

preparation: Pour all ingredients into a shaker filled with ice. Shake well, to relaese the flavour of the chili. Strain into a highball glass, filled with ice. Garnish with a wedge of lime and a chili (green or red).

name: KAMIKAZE
preparation: Shake and strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

name: WHITE LADY
preparation: Add all ingredients into cocktail shaker filled with ice. Shake well and strain into large cocktail glass.

name: HARVEY WALLBANGER
preparation: Pour vodka and orange juice into a highball glass filled with ice. Stir gently and float Galliano on top. Garnish with orange slices and cherry.
